verbose_text: More recently, 2 bone devices consisting of a bovine collagen matrix soaked with BMP-2 (Infuse Bone Graft, a lumbar tapered fusion device) or BMP-7 (Osigraft) have been introduced to the market to deal with non healing bone or complicated bone fractures [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR] and a novel biocompatible carrier device, OSTEOGROW, required small amounts of BMP-6, which can stimulate differentiation of mesenchymal stem cells and accelerate healing of critical-size bone defects has been tested in rats and rabbits [XREF_BIBR].
